languages.text: "Эклендиль пожелал остаться на Лилэтан, вместе с Муараном и нашими собратьями. Быть может, это и к лучшему — звезды сей части галактики слишком недружелюбны к Детям Азуриана".

traits.locale_text: "Экледниль пожелал остаться на Лилэтан, вместе с Муараном и нашими собратьями. Быть может, это и к лучшему — звезды сей части галакити слишком недружелюбны к Детям Азуриана".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eklendyl chose to stay on the Lilaethan together with Muaran and the rest of our kinsmen. Perhaps it is for the best, the stars in this part of the galaxy are hostile to the Children of Asuryan."
languages.original_text: "Эклендиль пожелал остаться на Лилэтан, вместе с Муараном и нашими собратьями. Быть может, это и к лучшему — звезды сей части галактики слишком недружелюбны к Детям Азуриана".

traits.locale_text: "Eklendyl chose to stay on the Lilaethan together with Muaran and the rest of our kinsmen. Perhaps it is for the best, the stars in this part of the galaxy are hostile to the Children of Asuryan."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “埃克伦迪选择留在莉莱赞，与穆兰和其他族人一起守在那里。或许这才是最好的选择，因为银河系此处的群星对阿苏焉的子嗣心怀敌意。”
languages.original_text: "Eklendyl chose to stay on the Lilaethan together with Muaran and the rest of our kinsmen. Perhaps it is for the best, the stars in this part of the galaxy are hostile to the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: “埃克伦迪选择留在莉莱赞，与穆兰和其他族人一起守在那里。或许这才是最好的选择，因为银河系此处的群星对阿苏焉的子嗣心怀敌意。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Eklendyl chose to stay on the Lilaethan together with Muaran and the rest of our kinsmen. Perhaps it is for the best, the stars in this part of the galaxy are hostile to the Children of Asuryan."

languages.text: «Eklendyl decidió quedarse en el Lilaethan junto con Muaran y el resto de nuestros hermanos. Tal vez sea lo mejor; las estrellas de esta región de la galaxia son hostiles hacia los hijos de Asuryan».
languages.original_text: "Eklendyl chose to stay on the Lilaethan together with Muaran and the rest of our kinsmen. Perhaps it is for the best, the stars in this part of the galaxy are hostile to the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: «Eklendyl decidió quedarse en el Lilaethan junto con Muaran y el resto de nuestros hermanos. Tal vez sea lo mejor; las estrellas de esta región de la galaxia son hostiles hacia los hijos de Asuryan».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エクレンディルは、ムアランや他の同胞とともにリラエタンに残ることを選んだ。おそらくそれが最善だったのだろう。この銀河の星々はアシュリアンの御子らにとって敵対的だ」
languages.original_text: "Eklendyl chose to stay on the Lilaethan together with Muaran and the rest of our kinsmen. Perhaps it is for the best, the stars in this part of the galaxy are hostile to the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: 「エクレンディルは、ムアランや他の同胞とともにリラエタンに残ることを選んだ。おそらくそれが最善だったのだろう。この銀河の星々はアシュリアンの御子らにとって敵対的だ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eklendyl entschied, auf der Welt der Lileath zu bleiben, gemeinsam mit Muaran und dem Rest unseres Volks. Vielleicht ist es besser so, die Sterne in diesem Teil der Galaxie sind den Kindern von Asuryan gegenüber feindlich eingestellt."
languages.original_text: "Eklendyl chose to stay on the Lilaethan together with Muaran and the rest of our kinsmen. Perhaps it is for the best, the stars in this part of the galaxy are hostile to the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: "Eklendyl entschied, auf der Welt der Lileath zu bleiben, gemeinsam mit Muaran und dem Rest unseres Volks. Vielleicht ist es besser so, die Sterne in diesem Teil der Galaxie sind den Kindern von Asuryan gegenüber feindlich eingestellt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Eklendyl a décidé de rester sur la lilaethan avec Muaran et nos semblables. C'est peut-être pour le mieux, car les étoiles dans ce secteur de la galaxie sont hostiles aux enfants d'Asuryan. »
languages.original_text: "Eklendyl chose to stay on the Lilaethan together with Muaran and the rest of our kinsmen. Perhaps it is for the best, the stars in this part of the galaxy are hostile to the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: « Eklendyl a décidé de rester sur la lilaethan avec Muaran et nos semblables. C'est peut-être pour le mieux, car les étoiles dans ce secteur de la galaxie sont hostiles aux enfants d'Asuryan. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eklendyl, Muaran ve geri kalan soydaşlarıyla birlikte Lilaethan'da kalmaya karar verdi. Belki de en iyisi budur. Galaksinin o kısmında yer alan yıldızlar, Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na pek dostane davranmazlar."
languages.original_text: "Eklendyl chose to stay on the Lilaethan together with Muaran and the rest of our kinsmen. Perhaps it is for the best, the stars in this part of the galaxy are hostile to the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: "Eklendyl, Muaran ve geri kalan soydaşlarıyla birlikte Lilaethan'da kalmaya karar verdi. Belki de en iyisi budur. Galaksinin o kısmında yer alan yıldızlar, Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na pek dostane davranmazlar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
